translations.english: Xiao and Cao were afraid, so they climbed over the wall to join Emperor Gaozu.

translations.chinese: 高祖乃書 帛射城上，與沛父老曰：「天下同苦秦久矣。
translations.english: Emperor Gaozu then wrote on silk and shot it onto the city wall, saying to the elders of Pei: "All under heaven have suffered under Qin for a long time.

translations.chinese: 今父老雖為沛令守，諸侯並起，今屠沛。
translations.english: Now although you elders are defending for the magistrate of Pei, the feudal lords are all rising up, and Pei will be massacred.

translations.chinese: 沛今共誅令，擇可立立之，以應諸侯，即室家完。
translations.english: If Pei now joins together to execute the magistrate and chooses someone worthy to establish as leader to respond to the feudal lords, then your families will be safe.

translations.chinese: 不然，父子俱屠，無為 也。」
translations.english: Otherwise, fathers and sons will all be massacred together. There will be no benefit."
